info.exampleTwo: This is a example two in english
info.text_1: Hello !. My name is Guillermo Ferraz. I live in Uruguay and I am a FullStack developer. Since I was little my passion has been computers. I like to be constantly learning and updating because I really love my job. I invite you to learn more about my profile, knowledge and skills.
info.text_2: If you are also a software developer, I will soon be uploading material about TypeScript, React, Redux, NextJs, Node, etc. and code examples to share that might be useful to you.
